name: Magnetic Golf
description:
Simple 2d mini golf prototype game with magnetic forces acting on your ball.  Created two levels as a prototype but unlikely to create more as can be rather frustrating to play.  Used the sfml library.  Educational at least.  The font and image stay in the same folder with the executable.

Just point and click with mouse.  Click to get past splash screen.

Six days is a bit rushed but I got it done-ish.

:P
